full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,GSHIN PO RJES 'DZIN GSER GYI SGO 'BYED CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007B CES GSHIN PO RJES 'DZIN GSER GYI SGO 'BYED CES BYA BA 'DI NI THOS BSAM SGOM GSUM LA BRTZON PA DANG RTOGS PA'I YON TAN @008A *, ,PHUN SUM TSOGS PA MER GIN NANG GSO DGE SLONG BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO GNYIS KYIS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES YANG YANG BSKUL BA'I NGOR, PAn CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES DPAL BZANG PO DANG, RJE BTZUN BLO BZANG NOR BU SHES RAB DPAL BZANG PO SOGS BLA MA DAM PA RNAMS KYI GSUNG BZHIN RIG PA 'DZIN PA DPAL BZHAD PA'I RDO RJE MING CAN GYIS SA LUG DBYAR 'BRING DKAR TSES BCU BZHI LA AER TI NI JO BO'I GTZUG LAG KHANG DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI BSOD NAMS DBANG PHYUG GO ,'DIS KYANG MAR GYUR 'GRO BA THAMS CAD DUS MYUR BAR ZHING MCHOG BDE BA CAN DU BGROD PAR GYUR CIG ,MANGGA LAM,, ,,
